Still too lazy to learn AI? Watch others get ahead while you stay behind. To the people over 40 who don't know how to use AI, tomorrow morning, we're starting the 28-day AI challenge for beginners over 40. Just 15 minutes a day to level up your life. In one week, you'll feel unstoppable. In two weeks, you'll have your strategy. In a month, you'll wonder why you didn't start sooner. Tap the screen to join us.
